ingredients.ingredient: 1 (24 ounce) bag unpeeled golden baby potatoes
1 teaspoon chopped fresh rosemary, or to taste
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste
sea salt and freshly ground black pepper to taste

cookingTips: Leave skins on for texture and nutrition retention
